title: The Decay of Lying - "Enjoy nature! I am glad..."

content.question: Vivian's first words ("Enjoy nature! I am glad to say that I have entirely lost that faculty") are surprising because Vivian

choices.label: prevents Cyril from finishing his thought
claims to enjoy having lost something that he obviously still possesses
implies that enjoying nature and smoking are not incongruous
is not responding to Cyril's remark

content.answer: claims to enjoy having lost something that he obviously still possesses

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain the function of contrasting characters.
